review.name: Jessica Smith
review.text: I recommend this app to everyone. Just amazing . Thank you. This app helped me in a lot of of things. Thank you <3

review.name: Ann Johnson
review.text: This is the best app I have used to manage customer reviews. It is very customizable with a ton of options. I love the customer service. They are lighting fast with any questions I have and provide great support when needed. I highly recommend it....

review.name: Jones Peter
review.text: Works great for me. Needed a little support with formatting and design etc. but all looking good now so very please - many thanks again!

review.name: Anderson Bill
review.text: This app is TOP NOTCH!! love it, simple and clean and the SUPPORT is 10000% on point! responsive and FIXES any issues I've had! HIGHLY RECCOMENEDED and you can't beat free
